You can attempt to use it a second time, overcharging the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder} at the risk of destroying it. When you do so, roll a @Check[type:flat|dc:10]. On a success, the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder} is broken. On a failure, the wayfinder is destroyed. If anyone tries to overcharge a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder} that's already been overcharged, the item is automatically destroyed (even if it has been repaired) and does not provide the activated benefit.

Wayfinder, Esoteric.name: Wayfinder, Esoteric
Wayfinder, Esoteric.description:
[Item]

Prerequisites Tier 2 with the Grand Archive; You own a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder}

Cost 2 Fame

Action Free Action

Effect You have modified your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder} to focus your mental energy, driving more reliable insights. When you slot this boon, you apply its benefits to one @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder} in your possession, granting you a special free action ability when the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder} is invested and in your possession.

You can activate this ability as a free action before you Recall Knowledge. If you roll a critical failure on the Recall Knowledge check, you instead get a failure.

You can safely use this benefit once per adventure. You can attempt to use it a second time, overcharging the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder} at the risk of destroying it. When you do so, roll a @Check[type:flat|dc:10]. On a success, the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder} is broken. On a failure, the wayfinder is destroyed. If anyone tries to overcharge a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder} that's already been overcharged, the item is automatically destroyed (even if it has been repaired) and does not provide the activated benefit.

Wayfinder, Harmonic.name: Wayfinder, Harmonic
Wayfinder, Harmonic.description:
[Item]

Prerequisites Tier 2 with the Envoy's Alliance; You own a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder}

Cost 2 Fame

Action Free action

Effect You have modified your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder} to resonate with your allies' actions, allowing you to better help them in times of need. When you slot this boon, you apply its benefits to one @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder} in your possession, granting you a special free action ability when the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder} is invested and in your possession.

You can activate this ability as a free action before you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Aid} an ally. If you roll a success on the check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Aid}, you instead get a critical success.

You can safely use this benefit once per adventure.You can attempt to use it a second time, overcharging the wayfinder at the risk of destroying it. When you do so, roll a @Check[type:flat|dc:10]. On a success, the wayfinder is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{Broken}. On a failure, the wayfinder is destroyed. Trying to overcharge it twice destroys it.

Wayfinder, Radiant.name: Wayfinder, Radiant
Wayfinder, Radiant.description:
[Item]

Prerequisites Liked by Radiant Oath; You own a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder}

Action 2 command

Effect The wayfinder glows with a spiritual radiance, revealing that which is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}. This has the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.HRb2doyaLtaoCfi3]{Faerie Fire}, except the effect occurs in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10-foot radius} centered around you.

You can safely use this benefit once per adventure. You can attempt to use it a second time, overcharging the wayfinder at the risk of destroying it. When you do so, roll a @Check[type:flat|dc:10]. On a success, the wayfinder is broken. On a failure, the wayfinder is destroyed. If anyone tries to overcharge a wayfinder that's already been overcharged, the item is automatically destroyed (even if it has been repaired) and does not provide the activated benefit.

Special You can apply multiple upgrades to a single wayfinder. Each upgrade only affects one wayfinder in your possession, chosen when the boon is purchased. If a wayfinder has multiple upgrades on it, you can only safely use each ability once per scenario.

If the wayfinder with this upgrade is destroyed, you can apply the upgrade to another wayfinder during Downtime for no additional cost beyond that of the wayfinder itself.

Wayfinder, Rugged.name: Wayfinder, Rugged
Wayfinder, Rugged.description:
[Item]

Prerequisites Tier 2 with the Horizon Hunters; You own a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder}

Cost 2 Fame

Action Single Action

Effect You have modified your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder} to absorb a small amount of your exhaustion, allowing you to continue exploring unhindered. When you slot this boon, you apply its benefits to one @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder} in your possession, granting you a special ability when the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder} is invested and in your possession.

As an action, you can reduce the severity of your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} condition, reducing that condition's value by 1.

You can safely use this benefit once per adventure. You can attempt to use it a second time, overcharging the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder} at the risk of destroying it.
